Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.master.keymanagementserver.kms.controllers.UserController

public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    provide functions for working with the userModel

        public boolean checkChallenge(UserModel userModel,
                              java.lang.String solvedChallenge)
        checks the provided challenge with the saved sha-512 hash of the original challenge
        Parameters:
        userModel - userModel which challenge should be checked
        solvedChallenge - the challenge that may be correct
        Returns:
        true if the challenge is the one in the database, false otherwise
